nodes.text: A small cloning facility could be found outside of Nym's Stronghold on the planet Lok at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

It was situated in a small, sand colored building with an unknown number of floors below ground. It contained the technology necessary to clone beings, as well as a 2-1B droid. The building was surrounded by a crumbling stone wall. A moisture vaporator stood next to the building.

The cloning facility is a place in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It provides players with a place to respawn ("clone") on Lok after they have been killed. The canonical status of such cloning facilities in Star Wars Galaxies' is unknown.

The type of building used for this cloning facility is also used in many places on Tatooine in the game. It usually features a turbolift to access two lower levels, but the buttons used to operate the elevator were removed in this building.
